FuncDef:
The df-election type preference-based command enables preference-based DF election.
The undo df-election type preference-based command disables preference-based DF election.
By default, the system is not enabled with preference-based DF election.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In multi-homing networking, if users want to specify the master DF based on the precedence of an ESI instance, run the df-election type preference-based command.
